name: Avatar: The Last Airbender - The Path of Zuko
name_original: Avatar: The Last Airbender - The Path of Zuko
description:
Avatar: The Last Airbender - The Path of Zuko is an arcade game developed by SMERC Design. It was originally released in 2008. ValuSoft published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Avatar: The Last Airbender - The Path of Zuko on PC.
